Value.label: Ignore Start-Level (Transmitting)
Value.Help: Dimmers controlled by this switch will start dimming from their current level.

Value.label: Night Light
Value.Help: In night-light mode the LED on the switch will turn ON when the switch is turned OFF.

Value.label: Invert Switch
Value.Help: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON.

Value.label: LED Transmission Indication
Value.Help: The ZRW103 will flicker its LED when it is transmitting to any of its 4 groups. This flickering can be set to not flicker at all, to flicker the entire time it is transmitting, or to flicker for only 1 second when it begins transmitting.
